channel.title: ~IceRealm help needed~ (I need help making fight cave)
channel.description:
Well basically I have the codes and everything. I know how to make it so npcs will spawn after a wave.
What I need help with: Finding the projectiles that some of the monsters shoot out Figuring out so that automatically once you kill all the monsters in the previous wave, the next wave starts.
Post if you wanna help me =]

item.title: ~IceRealm help needed~ (I need help making fight cave)
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“Milk and Java™, post:4, topic:182100”]I’m not sure if this will work, but if it will, it’s the easiet way I can think of.

  1. Make ints for your waves
  2. Make all NPCs in there agressive
  3. When you kill that NPC,it spawns more offscreen

That’s if there’s one monster per wave, otherwise you would have to make ints.[/quote]

Well I’ve made the ints and everything, but my fight caves is kinda cheesy.
Like you have to type ::nextlevel for the next monsters to spawn, and I know how to make it so they auto attack through NPCHandler.

I also need the gfx ids for the monsters.

Read full topic
item.source: ~IceRealm help needed~ (I need help making fight cave)

item.title: ~IceRealm help needed~ (I need help making fight cave)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I’m not sure if this will work, but if it will, it’s the easiet way I can think of.

  1. Make ints for your waves
  2. Make all NPCs in there agressive
  3. When you kill that NPC,it spawns more offscreen

That’s if there’s one monster per wave, otherwise you would have to make ints.

Read full topic
